result.markdown: --- title: "Week 4: The forecaster's toolbox" --- ::: {.cell} ::: ## What you will learn this week * Four benchmark forecasting methods that we will use for comparison * Fitted values, residuals * Forecasting with transformations ## Exercises (on your own or in tutorial) Complete Exercise 2-3, 5, 7, 9-10 from [Section 3.7 of the book](https://otexts.com/fpp3/decomposition-exercises.html) ## Exercise solutions ## Pre-seminar activities Read [Chapter 5 of the textbook](https://otexts.com/fpp3/toolbox.html) and watch all embedded videos ## Assignments * [GA1](../assignments/G1.qmd) is due on Monday 24 March. * [IA2](../assignments/A2.qmd) is due on Monday 07 April.
